Question
========

In a sample of 25 individuals, the variance is found to be 64. The SEM (standard error of the mean) is then

Answerlist
----------

* 0.32
* 1.6
* 2.56
* 12.8

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.32: Incorrect
* 1.6: Correct
* 2.56: Incorrect
* 12.8: Incorrect
